title: Getting annoyed at some ppl in this game
body:
I dont really care what the outcome is in my promos because i  lose them everytime, but thats besides the point. Its ruining the 3 other ppls promos/ game as well on my team. What am i talking about? The certain people you get in promos.


ONLY in promos do u get top ashes, mid ad sonas, and people who threaten to afk if they get stuck with supp, saying they suck at supp but theyre gold 3. Sigh. .Now, i dont mind these picks as long as they can play them, but no these ones couldnt. Both of them fed in each game.  I swear when its not promos i get good cooperative teams. Why is this?   does rito purposely match u with retards in promos and cooperatuive people in non promos?

Edit - Now in game we got another troll running into turrets cause got ks'ed. Once again, rarely happens in non promo games.

replies.body: Not sure if this is bait but if it is, I'll bite. It's because people know when you're in your promos thanks to websites such as lolnexus and then intentionally try to ruin the game for you (called gatekeeping if I'm not mistaken). Personally I think Riot should remove the ability for players to see when others are in their promos.
no but its literally nearly every promos. And as i said theres other ppl in promos and their game gets ruined too because of these idiots.

Which is why it seems like gatekeeping. If Riot were to remove the ability to see when another player is in their promos I'm sure you'd notice a strong decrease in the times it happens and probably even be able to get gold.
Well yes thats a good suggestion. I really dont care if i get gold or not. Im just playing ranked to improve and dont wanna see %%%%heads

I feel that if they remove the ability to show when people are in promos on things like lolnexus, the gatekeepers will troll in all the games 'just in case' someone is in their promos and they can ruin it for them.
That would mean they'd be reported a lot more often, being found out by Riot easier and removed from the game.

It's really not that hard to carry people in silver. My smurf was bronze 3 a few weeks ago, now it's gold 5 with plat 5 mmr. It's really not that hard..

get good.

lol i knew a comment from you would show. Always does. Funny thing is. You didnt climb it up at all. mearly EVERY game u have duoed with some guy. Your argument is invalid. + ur argument is out of contect to this thread anyway

> lol i knew a comment from you would show. Always does. Funny thing is. You didnt climb it up at all. mearly EVERY game u have duoed with some guy. Your argument is invalid. + ur argument is out of contect to this thread anyway

But I still did well in every single match, and I only duo'd for about half of my matches.

It's not my fault you are terrible. The fact is, you don't belong in gold, that's why you can't get it. Maybe if you weren't such a whiny annoying pleb people would want to play with you.
shh noob u admitted to getting carried. Please if u wanna %%%% talk solo q ranked on a new smurf on all your matches k ty

Enjoy a lifetime of silver. haha.

Noob.

Try when you get higher in the ladder and get matched with the same people again and again all day

I've gotten the same troll 3 times today who fed, afk'd and then verbally abused our whole team resulting in losses.

I just lost what little faith i had left in the provisional system too, me and a friend have been playing lol for a few years now but we generally only play normals, and we aren't fantastic at the game but we aren't bad and this year we decided to do ranked although we couldn't duo cos of circumstances. we both had a bit of bad luck in the provisionals and he ended up in B4 and i ended up in B3 and worked up to b1 in the next few days which i was disappointed in but had to accept it, 

then i got another friend playing who for his first few games thought the aim of the game was to get to the other teams summoner platform, he bought lots and lots of xp boosts just to get to lvl 30 fast, the day he gets there, he plays ranked with no rune pages, he still says this to the jungler when his jungler ganks 
"hey %%%% off this is my lane I'm SOLO TOP dont come in and ks me" he uses both teleport and flash to ks an already far secured kill and stays out of team fights unless he sees a kill he can get. and gets put in S2 after his provisionals -_-

I'm really happy for him! but faith lost in provisional system haha
You're referring to provisionals, not promos.

Quite right! my mistake, thanks for letting me know
